description.value:
Replaces an Arm, +2 Toughness Bonus to limb location. Poor versions have -10 WS and BS Tests, Good has +10 to Agility Tests requiring delicate movement (Such as Tech-Use Tests for repairing small circuitry) and Strength Tests using the arm.

Requirements

Damage works as normal, although inappropriate effects like bleeding just render limb useless

Effect: Scarce / Initiated

Notes: 1000 T 15 R
